title: Riot sucks as a game company
body: They do not even review game logs or gameplay but want to have a good community. The fact they don't have feeding considered into being toxic is baffling. Feeding is just as bad as flaming teammates and most players will agree. Not trying to win a game is basically throwing and should be considered toxic. Fuck Riot they don't have a definitive stance on anything. They let cheaters and public known flamers and re-endorse them like NIghtblue, game is shit and the community is worse. Fuck Riot

replies.body: Lets also not forget about how that one "Draven main" guy was a massive influence on league's negative flame, toxicity and feeding at the time from before. He was banned multiple of times and only came back because of $$$ and nothing pisses me off more than throwing away values/rules/morality for cash. Better people at that time have endorsed this company so much more and it is very sad to see it come down to this.
To be fair, he also recieved a unique punishment which they hadn't completely determined the rules surrounding it prior.

Intentional Feeding can and will be punished. It isn't always an open close case though. Doesn't help that the case load is massove because someone wants to report the Sion Support for trolling/inting.

Yeah but a player deliberately not trying to win is not trolling or toxic? Since most of the report system is automated there is nothing to detect that. But thank god they didn't flame someone, am I right?

It's not a zero-sum punishment system. Behavior and punishments are decided upon individually. Someone feeding. intentionally or otherwise, does not make it OK for you to derail the game even more by flaming them.
Is there not a equal punishment for people that do feed despite your team asking you to not feed?
You need to be concerned about **your** behavior, which is the only behavior you can control.

Finally. Bro, you're a unicorn. Upvoted for intelligence.

Everyone else who posts here regarding their punishment flames all of us who advise people to be concerned with their own behavior.

Feeding in itself isn't a punishable offense you know. Though intentional feeding is punishable. 

Sounds like you are unable to identify the differences.

Define feeding.

If you're referring to people that are simply playing poorly, then no, there is no punishment at all for someone simply playing poorly. **Intentional** feeding requires that it be proven that they're intentionally playing poorly - something that is very, very hard to do.

The system makes a valiant attempt, once in a while blatant trolls do get punished, and inters as well.

You dont see the results often (between toxic players being far more common than inters, plus the lower detection rate), but it does happen. It seems like the games get manually reviewed if enough evidence piles up.

Riot sucks because they don't cater for new players.
They only cater for ranked players. Riot don't care
about what we have to say as they do nothing to resolve
it.They would actually make the game better, less toxicity
due to the frustration of new players versing  other players
way  above their play skills.

Yeah, people suck. Its already against the rules to not try to win, and people get banned for it all the time. But when theres millions of players, it ain't gonna stop. It cant. Its Riot vs. Millions. Lower your expectations, theyre just a game company.
